name: Dumbbells 2KG
description: Great for power walks, group exercises, releasing stress, therapy, toning, aerobics and yoga.These vinyl dumbbells are great for both a gym and home workout

name: Electronic Scales
description: A scale or balance is a device used to measure weight or mass. These are also known as mass scales, weight scales, mass balances, and weight balances.

name: Gym Ball
description: A gym ball, also recognized as a yoga ball, is a ball built of soft elastic with a diameter of around 35 to 85 centimeters and inflated with air.

name: Herbal Tea1
description: Herbal teas can be made with fresh or dried flowers, fruit, leaves, seeds or roots.Source products from quality suppliers from China & other Asian countries.

name: Herbal Tea2
description: Steeping herbal tea is easy. Simply heat fresh, filtered water to a rolling boil, and set aside about one teaspoon of herbal tea (or one tea bag) per six-ounce cup.

name: Jumping Rope
description: Jumping rope is a form of exercise that involves swinging a rope around your body and jumping over it as it passes under your feet.
